name: David Llanos LÃ³pez
title: Senior Front-End Developer
summary:
Senior front-end developer with 8+ years of experience building real-world web applications in production environments for startups.

Interested in Angular, Test Driven Development, Web Components, Design Systems, Artificial Intelligence, HTML Canvas and Game Development.

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description:
• Created a digital solution for home-based rehabilitation using a Monorepo architecture with two Angular projects and one Vue project, reusing Typescript code as needed.
  • Created Web Components to reuse components between projects.
  • Ensured code quality through unit testing with Jest.
  • Generated code documentation and project documentation using Typedoc.
  • Tracked the patients' full body movement in real time through a webcam using AI and analyzed the data to improve their rehabilitation process. Used the latest web technologies such as MoveNet, WebAssembly and WebSocket.
  • Collaborated in a scrum environment with other engineers, designers, and QA to ensure the project was delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest possible standards.
  • Gathered and analyzed project requirements, ensured ongoing project maintenance, and identified and resolved issues.
  • Trained and guided junior developers. This involved leading code reviews, pair programming, and providing on-the-job training.

experience.title: Game Developer
experience.description:
• Created and maintained the Android version of City Nostra, a location-based game with a mafia theme.
  • Created a web platform for teachers to create location-based games. The front end was made with Bootstrap and jQuery, and the back end with PHP.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer - Freelance
experience.description: • Created and maintained a website for a wood flooring company. The front end was made with Bootstrap, and the back end with Express.js and Parse.

experience.title: Android and iOS Developer - Internship
experience.description: • Created an Android and iOS app with with user management and push notifications to receive alerts from an external source.

projects.title: Final Degree Project
projects.description: The project consisted in the creation of a website where you can create facial avatars in pixel art style with realtime face tracking. Made with Vue and MediaPipe.

projects.title: Game Jams
projects.description: I participated many times in game jams such as Ludum Dare and Global Game Jam.
